Task no.1: Karel Game

Statement of the library

Create a C library for creating programs in a programming language Karel.

Define the assignment

Restrictive conditions for the solution:

Maximal width of Karel world.

See also:
MAX_WIDTH

Maximal height of Karel world.

See also:
MAX_HEIGHT

Suggestion of the problem solution

Used data structures

See also:
World
Robot

Used data types

See also:
World
Robot

Use of the program

Use of the program are detailed written in closure.

Translation of the program

Program is translated by translator of C language

Conclusion

Evaluation of solutions

Library contain implementation of all functions which are on API page. Function turnOn() read whole karel world to two dimensional array and during translation it shouldn't came to any errors or warning.

Opportunities of use and expansion

Karel can be use for teaching and demonstration C language. Program can be expand for example by eliminating limiting terms by automatic adjusting.

Reference documentation

Documentation source code is create with automated tool Doxygen.
